properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 2:23PM EST until February 10 at 9:56PM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
Dan River Near Wentworth affecting Rockingham County

Dan River near Danville affecting Caswell...Rockingham...City of
Danville and Pittsylvania Counties

Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County

Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County

Several inches of rain fell across the region yesterday into
this morning. Excessive runoff continues across the region
resulting in minor to moderate flooding along the Roanoke
River and its tributaries.

* Flood Warning for
the Dan River at South Boston
* until Monday evening.
* At 2 PM EST this afternoon the stage was 24.5 feet...and rising.
* Flood Stage is 22.0 feet. Moderate flood stage is 29.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring AND Minor flooding is forecast
to continue.
* The river will continue rising to near 28.9 feet this evening,
almost reaching Moderate Flood Stage.
* Impact...at 29.0 feet...A number of businesses in the Riverdale
area are affected.  U.S. Highway 501 will be closed in this region.
A portion of U.S. 58 may also be impacted at 29.0 feet.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive through flooded areas...the water may be much deeper
than you think.

Listen to noaa weather radio or your favorite media outlet for later
statements or warnings.
